duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare goods and materials to be shipped along with their corresponding packing slips; perform basic inventory maintenance
Ensure compliance with established internal control procedures and process material stock requests, orders, and returns using inventory and billing systems necessary for installation
Handle defective, discontinued, or recalled goods and destroy returned goods as appropriate; perform check-ins and check-outs and verify order completeness and inspect for damage

Review the daily processing of goods received as returns and the return of goods to vendors and ensure the timely and accurate processing of all returns; receive, issue, and store supplies and equipment and process customer turn-ins; inspect, verify, and count supplies and equipment for accuracy, overall condition, and accountability

Maintain secure inventory storage and control of materials into/out of the warehouse; perform duties associated with storage, shipping, receiving, and physical counts of the assets to verify integrity

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma/GED and off-road forklift certification (OSHA knowledge preferred)
